Description: Bead: consisting of a twisted thread of translucent pale amethyst-coloured glass.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: The bead has a trail of glass coming off it, from manufacture. Probably the purpose if its discard.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1894 / Tell el Amarna (pl. XIII,. p. 56)
